member.name: M:RESTBot.ListItemPlugin.PermMaskString(OpenMetaverse.PermissionMask)
member.summary: Returns a 3-character summary of the PermissionMask CMT if the mask allows copy, mod and transfer -MT if it disallows copy --T if it only allows transfer --- if it disallows everything

member.name: T:RESTBot.CreateNotecardPlugin
member.summary: Class to create notecards; params are notecard name, notecard (textual data) and optionally a key (item UUID) to embed an item inside the notecard

member.name: F:RESTBot.Reaper.REAPER_INTERVAL
member.summary: interval between reaper sweeps in ms

member.name: T:RESTBot.XMLConfig.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration class designed for the `bots array found in the xml config file
member.remarks: To find a copy of this class, see the Configuration class

member.name: M:RESTBot.DebugUtilities.WriteInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs text in the normal white color.
member.param: What to be outputted to console
member.remarks: This only outputs colored version on console! Will prepend "[INFO] " to message

member.name: M:RESTBot.DebugUtilities.WriteDebug(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs text in a gray color.
member.param: What to be outputted to console
member.remarks: This only outputs colored version on console! Will prepend "[DEBUG] " to message

member.name: M:RESTBot.DebugUtilities.WriteWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs text in a yellow color.
member.param: What to be outputted to console
member.example: DebugUtilities.WriteWarning("Could not find custom configuration file, using default");
member.remarks: This only outputs colored version on console! Will prepend "[WARN] " to message

member.name: M:RESTBot.DebugUtilities.WriteError(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs text in a red color.
member.param: What to be outputted to console
member.example: DebugUtilities.WriteError("Socket could not be established, quitting");
member.remarks: This only outputs colored version on console! Will prepend "[ERROR] " to message

member.name: M:RESTBot.DebugUtilities.WriteSpecial(System.String)
member.summary: Outputs text in a blue color. Well, it would if log4net had extra logging levels.
member.param: What to be outputted to console
member.remarks: This only outputs colored version on console! Will prepend "[SPEC] " to message. This type of method should be used temporarly when developing specific blogs of code

member.name: M:RESTBot.Program.RegisterAllCommands(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Register all RestPlugins to the RestBot static plugin dictionary

member.name: M:RESTBot.Program.RegisterAllStatefulPlugins(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Grab all the subclass type definitions of StatefulPlugin out of an assembly

member.name: T:RESTBot.RestPlugin
member.summary: A base class for REST plugins

member.name: F:RESTBot.RestPlugin.MethodName
member.summary: The name of the method. Should be set in the constructor.

member.summary: Process the request through this method
member.param: The RestBot that is doing the processing

member.name: T:RESTBot.StatefulPlugin
member.summary: A base class for stateful plugins, ie those requiring actions on events from a specific instance of libsecondlife or RestBot

member.summary: The name of the method. Should be set in the constructor.

member.name: M:RESTBot.StatefulPlugin.Initialize(RESTBot.RestBot)
member.summary: An optionally overridable method for setting up events and callbacks from a RestBot

member.summary: Process the request through this method
member.param: The RestBot that is doing the processing
